scene.name: intro
scene.line: We'll see what she can make of it ... Yeah, pretty good I think. I hit some trouble down by the narrow tunnel: some kind of fast-growing freshwater barnacles just about sealed it up. I picked away for half an hour before I gave up and went around the other way.
But I got the `catch of the day`, that's the important part. That's what people travel for.
scene.option: Pretty cold here for diving, right?
Are there a lot of fish in this lake? It seems so quiet.

scene.name: catch-of-the-day
scene.line: I don't know how she'll fix him, but that quality ought to do something for, uh ... what do they call it ... "mouthfeel?"

scene.name: cold
scene.line: The cold I can handle. I've got an oil heater in the diving bell, and if it's really bad I might take a nip of something here and there.

scene.name: quiet
scene.line: Yeah, there's a fish or two ... not too many. It's not like a surface lake, where you've got sunlight propping up the food chain. Life down here grows slowly, patiently, quietly.

scene.name: drink
scene.line: Will you stay for a drink? I've got a dark rum that goes well with coffee. Ha ha.
scene.option: It's a bit early for me ...
I think we're about to leave, but thanks.

scene.name: too-early
scene.line: Yeah, seems like it's `always` too early.

scene.name: passing-through
scene.line: Just passing through. Hey, aren't we all?

scene.name: food-ready
scene.line: Oh, she's got your food ready. You all enjoy your meal, alright?
